sn11.6:2.1: This verse is also in Ja 31. This delightful story shows the complete transformation of Indra from the war god who revels in slaughter (Atharva Veda 8.8). Indra showed a comparable development in Hinduism, too, for he is said to have saved a wise parrot in his nest when the tree was poisoned (Mahābhārata, Anuśāsanaparva 5).
